attributes.action: allow those whe are terminally ill to die with dignity, when and where they wish, even if it means through assisted suicide
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: a person who is terminal;ly ill should be able to decide how they want to die, assisted suicide should be legalised for those that wish it.  let people who are terminally ill die with some dignity when and where they wish it

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
